## Installation

```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/[GITHUB-REPO].git
cd [PROJECT-NAME]

# Install dependencies
uv sync
```

## Development

```bash
# Run tests
make test

# Run linting
make lint

# Run type checking
make typecheck

# Run all checks
make validate
```
